titles.title: 491 The Mystic Word Of Thine (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
That mystic word of Thine
O sov'reign Lord
Is all too pure
Too high - too deep for me
Weary of striving
And with longing faint
I breathe it back again
In pray'r to Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Abide in me I pray
And I in Thee
From this good hour
O leave me nevermore
Then shall the discord cease
The wound be healed
The life-long bleeding
Of the soul be o'er

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Abide in me
O'ershadow by Thy love
Each half-formed purpose
And dark thought of sin
Quench e'er it rise
Each selfish low desire
And keep my soul as Thine
Calm and divine

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As some rare perfume
In a vase of clay
Pervades it with a fragrance
Not its own
So when Thou dwellest
In a mortal soul
All heaven's own sweetness
Seems around it thrown

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The soul alone
Like a neglected harp
Grows out of tune
And needs that Hand divine
Dwell Thou within it
Tune and touch the chords
Till every note and string
Shall anwer Thine

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Abide in me
There have been moments blest
When I have heard Thy voice
And felt Thy power
Then evil lost its grasp
And passion hushed
Owned the divine
Enchantment of the hour

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
These were but seasons
Beautiful and rare
Abide in me
And they shall ever be
Fulfill at once
Thy precept and my prayer
Come and abide in me
And I in Thee
